title: Building High-Quality Datasets for Portuguese LLMs: From Common Crawl Snapshots to Industrial-Grade Corpora
summary: This paper explores scalable methods for building web-based corpora for Large Language Models (LLMs) in Portuguese, aiming to construct high-quality training datasets. It discusses the importance of data quality and composition for LLM performance.
usefulness_reason: The title and abstract explicitly mention "Building High-Quality Datasets" and "training data", which is directly relevant to the "Contextual dataset" aspect of the query. While it doesn't mention spatio-temporal or point processes, the strong focus on dataset creation makes it useful.
